Return Home:teleports to capital
AInocast:1
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster creates a rift in space that carries the entire army back to the home province on astral currents. The same restrictions and dangers as the Returning ritual applies.
